experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: • Managed day to day Retail and Business Banking transactions.• Ensured high speed delivering while handling cash transactions as teller.• Acquisition of CASA to meet month-end targets• Cross selling of various products of the Bank like Insurance, Mutual Funds, and Loans.• Strive to achieve customer satisfaction to the highest level.• Met clients and offer payment solutions and suggested the various products of the bank.• Attained efficiency in the Operations Work- lending, product sales, customer service, and safety and security of the branch.• Increased the customer base of the Bank and strengthen customer relationships through networking.• Participated in community affairs to promote the Bank’s visibility and enhance new and existing business opportunities.

projects: [{"title":"Procurement, Works Policy and Award of Contract at NTPC","start_date":"Jun 2011","description":"NTPC runs the power generation business and operates power plants. These huge power plants involve high costs & bulk materials for supply, installation, commissioning & erection. For convenience, NTPC splits the requirement of plant equipment into numerous packages and invites bids for these packages. Therefore this project includes how a contract is being awarded to any party keeping in mind their financial and competitive abilities."},{"title":"An Empirical Study on Exchange Traded Fund"}]
